ai-tha-ap129:1.1_0: “While staying in the middle of a lake,
ai-tha-ap129:1.2_0: a master of the three Vedas:
ai-tha-ap129:4.4_0: a pleasant and folk in the present life,
ai-tha-ap129:5.1_0: is golden colored, a golden floor,
ai-tha-ap129:5.3_0: The Teacher standing in the sky,
ai-tha-ap129:6.1_0: “This gift is the fruit of this gift,
ai-tha-ap129:6.4_0: Would he be reborn in a bad place?’
ai-tha-ap129:7.1_0: and because of that bright root:
ai-tha-ap129:7.4_0: having left victory and defeat behind.
ai-tha-ap129:8.2_0: I was a king of Sumaṅgala,
ai-tha-ap129:10.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Soṇa.
ai-tha-ap129:11.1_0: he saw the seventh Elder Nuns’ fruition.
